extension.title: MindTouch PageBus Extension
extension.label: PageBus
extension.description: This extension contains functions for interacting with the PageBus.

function.name: alert
function.description: Show messages on a channel in an alert window.

head.script:
DekiWiki.subscribe(args.subscribe ?? '*', null, function(c, m, d) { var s = ''; for(var f in m) s += f + ': ' + m[f] + '
'; alert(args.title ?? 'Alert Box' + '
channel: [' + c + ']
' + s); });

function.param: Regular expression pattern to use for test.
